Message Box

  • Default
  • Large
  • Documentation

Message Box

This message box variation contains: image, title and text. You shouldn't use a button here because it won't match margins designers are using.

This message box variation have larger margins and always contains: image, text and button(s). Notice we don't include a title here.

Documentation

Default Message 
<div class="sui-box sui-message">

	<img
		src="/dist/image.png"
		srcset="/dist/image.png 1x, /dist/image@2x.png 2x"
		class="sui-image"
		aria-hidden="true"
	/>

	<div class="sui-message-content">

		<h2>Message Box Title</h2>

		<p>Here goes message box content.</p>

	</div>

</div>
Large Message 
<div class="sui-box sui-message sui-message-lg">

	<img
		src="/dist/image.png"
		srcset="/dist/image.png 1x, /dist/image@2x.png 2x"
		class="sui-image"
		aria-hidden="true"
	/>

	<div class="sui-message-content">

		<p>Here goes message box content.</p>

		<!--
		NOTE:
		Always add button(s) inside paragraph tag.
		-->
		<p><button class="sui-button">Button</button></p>

	</div>

</div>
